Posts.Content: Hi, I had breast cancer in 2004 and had the blue dye.  It hurt a little but don't worry you will be fine.  My breast remained a light blue after it for many, many months after it so don't worry it will be very normal.  Good luck and it will all be over soon.
Posts.Title: Blue Dye

Posts.Content: Of course you are going to be in pain. Hang in and let me know how you are doing. I went through this 2 years ago and my breast where I had the cancer is still sore.
Posts.Title: While im Waiting For my Results

Posts.Content: Does everyone gain weight after having breast cancer?  I had breast cancer in 2004 and can't seem to lose any weight.  I am still on Arimidex, my breast even got larger.
Posts.Title: Weight Gain
